extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by retrieving the installed version of Atlassian products.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Install the Latest Version of Atlassian Products
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest version of Atlassian products to mitigate the vulnerability, prioritizing internet-facing instances.

affected_products: Jira Service Management Data Center: 5.12.0 to 5.12.5 (LTS), 5.11.0 to 5.11.3, 5.10.0 to 5.10.2, 5.9.0 to 5.9.2, 5.8.0 to 5.8.2, 5.7.0 to 5.7.2, 5.6.0 to 5.6.2, 5.5.0 to 5.5.1, 5.4.0 to 5.4.18 (LTS), and any earlier versions
